_meanings:
{@--5@} Any recipient vessel or viscus
of the body; the Āśayas are 7:  
--{#vAta°, pitta°, Slezman°, rakta°, Ama°, pakva°#}
(and {#garBa°#} in the case of women).

{@--7@} Meaning, intention, 
purport, gist; {#ityASayaH; evaM kaverASayaH#}
(<ab>oft.</ab> used by commentators; see
{#aBiprAya#}).

{@--13@} Virtue or vice (as the
eventual cause of pleasure or pain).

{@--17@} A
kind of pit (made for catching 
animals); {#Aste paramasaMtapto nUnaM siMha#} 
{#ivASaye#} <ls>Mb.</ls>
